price: (73) So We said, "Strike him [i.e., the slain man] with part of it."[31] Thus does Allāh bring the dead to life, and He shows you His signs that you might reason.
arabic: فَقُلۡنَا ٱضۡرِبُوهُ بِبَعۡضِهَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُحۡيِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: [31]- i.e., the cow. Thereupon, Allāh restored life to the man, who informed them of his murderer.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: faqul'nā iḍ'ribūhu bibaʿḍihā kadhālika yuḥ'yī al-lahu al-mawtā wayurīkum āyātihi laʿallakum taʿqilūna
